name: RAM Recovery
description:
A color matching game.

Instructions

  1. Click and drag RAM onto RAM slots of the same color
  2. After a while, RAM in a slot will auto eject
  3. Dragging on to the wrong slot will destroy that slot
  4. Game ends when all slots are destroyed or the time runs out
  5. You get points based how long RAM stays in a slot

Written for the OneHourGameJam #155
